comments:
Build: 20020502

Right after I pushed the Debug button on the Launch configurations dialog, 
an "Internal Error" dialog box popped up. before I could get a chance to look 
at the details, another dialog box popped up, with the following message:

Internal Error.

An internal error occurred while showing an internal error.
It is recommended to exit the workbench.
Subsequent errors may happen and may terminate the workbench without warning.
See error log for more details.

Exit Workspace?

When I closed the internal error pop-ups, the Launch configuration dialog was 
still open.
